I'm not married, but I love my new sweater.
I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.
the death of kurt cobain marred my middle school years.

i am a democrat.

I try to stay active and eat healthy to make myself feel younger.

content.text: Hi there! How are you?
Hi there! I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm excited to be chatting with you today!
I'm excited to be chatting with you too! I love meeting new people.
Me too! What do you do for fun?
I love to cook, read, and spend time with my dog.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook anything from my parents' home country. I'm really good at making homemade noodles.
That sounds delicious! I've never had homemade noodles before.
You should try them sometime! They're really easy to make.
I will! What's your favorite thing to read?
I love to read all kinds of books, but my favorite is historical fiction.
Me too! I love learning about different time periods.
I know, right? It's so fascinating to see how people lived in the past.
It is. I love imagining what it would be like to live in a different time.
Me too! I would love to go back in time and see the pyramids of Giza.
That would be amazing! I would love to see the Statue of Liberty.
That would be cool too! I love seeing all the different landmarks in the world.
Me too! I'm so glad we had this conversation. I learned a lot about you.
Me too! I'm glad I got to meet you.
It was nice talking to you! Have a great day!
You too
